content-introduction: Kanj Charity Social Network is a charity social networking application running on mobile phones, for the purpose of sharing information and creating auctions for charity purposes.
content-feature:
- Sign in, sign in with Google, FB, register 
- Post, edit, delete posts, add comments, like, dislike 
- Post, edit, delete auctions, add pricing, like, dislike, select pricing 
- Online payment (Momo) 
- Report articles, report auction articles 
- Push Notifications 
- Light and dark interface 
- Vietnamese language, English 
- Send feedback
